message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested in the product but $100 is a bit too high for me. Would you consider selling it for $85?

Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to save some money, but I have to make a living too! I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counteroffer at $92.50. It's the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a great deal for you.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway.  How about we settle at $88? That's a fair price for both of us.
Hi Bob, I'm glad we're still negotiating! I can see you're serious about getting a good deal. I'll meet you at $90, but that's as low as I can go. It's still a great price for a fantastic product!
Hi Alice, you drive a hard bargain!  I'm willing to go up to $89, but that's my final offer.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your persistence! I'll give you one last chance to meet me at a price I'm comfortable with. I'll sell it to you for $92. It's the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a great deal for you.
